directions: In a large serving bowl, stir together the tomatoes, honeydew melon, cantaloupe, red onion, jalapeno and cilantro. Stir in the orange juice, almonds, salt and lime juice. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving for best flavor.
ingredients: 1/2 honeydew melon, peeled and finely diced
title: Cold Melon Salsa
